a.title: School Committee Meeting on School Closure

div.a: School Committee Meeting on School Closure

nav.div: Needham Public Schools » Departments » Superintendent's Office » Updates/Information During School Closure » Community Resources During School Closure

span.em:
Dear Families,
While our schools are closed, staff are working remotely, and we want to provide you with local, state, and national resources that can assist you. Below is a list of organizations that you can turn to for help with food, housing, emotional support and for emergency response. Please click on the name of each organization to learn more about what they offer during this time.

table.style: padding: 2px; margin: 2px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: rgb(79, 129, 189); width: 700px;

strong.a: Beth Israel Lahey Health Information about COVID-19

td.em: Needham Youth & Family Services offers mental health support

table.style: border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; padding: 2px; margin: 2px; width: 700px; border-color: rgb(79, 129, 189);

span.strong: Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital Needham Emergency Room

td.em: If you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19, and need to go to the Emergency Department, please call ahead and let them know of your symptoms.

strong.a: Newton-Wellesley Hospital Department of Emergency Medicine

td.em: f you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19, and need to go to the Emergency Department, please call ahead and let them know of your symptoms.

br.em: Please note that if you have a medical emergency that required 9-1-1, and you are experiencing symptoms of, or are diagnosed with COVID-19, you must tell the dispatcher so that our first responders can take appropriate precautions.

table.style: padding: 2px; margin: 2px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: rgb(79, 129, 189); width: 700px;

br.em: 27/7 mental health hotline, emotional support, suicide hotline through Mass 2-1-1

strong.a: Massachusetts Department of Public Health Information on COVID-19
Statewide Information on COVID-19 through 2-1-1 system

td.em: Receive updated information, resources and referrals that are translated into more than 150 languages, 24 hours a day.

table.style: padding: 2px; margin: 2px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: rgb(79, 129, 189); width: 700px;

strong.a: Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) COVID-19 Information

table.style: width: 700px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: rgb(0, 112, 192);

span.strong: Boston Providers and Community Meal Program Updates

strong.span: Allston-Brighton, Back Bay, Chinatown, Fenway, South End

span.a: Beacon Hill, Charlestown, Downtown, East Boston, North End. West End

strong.span: Hyde Park, Jamaica Plain, Mattapan, Roslindale, West Roxbury
